page.title: 08THE FUTURE OF NEWTON.
page.content: 2 of Newton homes are holiday ones only and residents dread the thought of further homes of this category as they spell death to an already small community.The resident newcomers have rescued the village from the apathy into which its depopulation and empty buildings had made it sink.The village sees its future as a low-density rural residential area with a strong policy of conserving its vernacular character of limestone and red pantiles for its buildings and for having traditional fences and hedges rather than open-plan frontages.There is little prospect of any small scale industry and the only village employers are the pub and a video-maker whose local employees are 2.
